Administrator Subclassing / Dual Class Drandum:
Transferring power from the subclass to the main class has a strong influence on the soul. It is difficult, though, that your soul is strengthened by Mimir's Elixir.
For the manifestation of the power division in addition to Mimir's Elixir to get Baptism Dark Magician . Go to the Valley of the Dark Dragon Mage and get the magic of reincarnation.
After receiving the magic of reincarnation get certified abilities are able to subclass, then return to the state main class and then talk to me.
